attributes.action: Require job seekers to take part in community service as a compulsory scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition the Prime Minister to require those who have been seeking work for over 13 weeks and who do not have dependents below school age, to give something back to the community in the form of community service or charity work. With the number of hours required to reflect the amount of money received and what would be earned at minimum wage.
